oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Red Foley Show
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Excerpt from radio program the Red Foley Show, featuring Red Foley (host/performer), Norma Jean (performer), Chet Atkins, (performer), the Tall Timber Boys (performers), Carl Smith (performer), and Cliff Carlisle (performer), date and episode number unknown.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Red Foley; Norma Jean; Chet Atkins; Tall Timber Boys; Carl Smith; Cliff Carlisle
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (00:00) Opening statement and theme (Red Foley) -- (00:34) Tennessee Border (Red Foley) -- (02:27) Foley thanks the audiences -- (02:45) commercial -- (03:23) Foley introduces Norma Jean -- (03:34) It's A Little More Like Heaven (Norma Jean) -- (05:11) Foley thanks Norma and introduces Chet Atkins -- (05:31) Atkins talks with Foley and introduces the next tune -- (06:02) Tiger Rag (Chet Atkins electric guitar) -- (07:30) Foley thanks Atkins -- (07:40) Foggy River (Red Foley) -- (10:00) Foley thanks the audience, and introduces the Tall Timber Boys -- (10:28) This Little Girl Of Mine (Tall Timber Boys) -- (12:08) Foley talks and introduces Carl Smith -- (12:27) Smith and Foley talk and introduce the next tune -- (12:41) Loose Talk (Carl Smith) -- (15:00) Saturday Night Rag (Cliff Carlisle fiddle) [unconfirmed] -- (16:13) Foley thanks Cliff and introduces the next tune -- (16:30) Catch A Falling Star (Red Foley) -- (18:40) Closing statements and theme (Red Foley)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Red Foley show (Radio program); Foley, Red, 1910-1968; Jean, Norma; Atkins, Chet; Tall Timber Boys (Musical group); Smith, Carl, 1927-2010; Smith, Carl; Carlisle, Cliff, 1904-1983;
